name: Trivia
overview: Trivia is a single player game designed to test your knowledge of lesser known facts and figures. The computer will ask you a series of questions and you must select your answer in the time available. On occasions a 'pass' option will be available and this allows you to move onto the next question. Each question answered correctly will complete a square on the score table. The points awarded are displayed in the boxes. For each completed grid you will be awarded an extra life. At the start of the game you will have two lives.
